segments.text: How could you handle living in such a big family ? Does everyone get along ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . We love each other and take care of each other .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In such a big family , there must be a head . Who's the head of your family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My grandpa . He has the final word about almost everything . My grandpa is “ President , ” and Grandma is “ Vice-President . ” My parents , uncles and aunts try to arrive at a consensus on important questions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is a family like yours common in South Korea ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Not anymore.Mine is highly educated but traditional family . Most South Korea families today are a lot smaller . In traditional families , the old people are well respected and taken good care of . Ho
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My family setup is a bit different . In New York city , there're only three people , my mother , my stepfather and me . During this summertime , I fly out to California and live with my dad . Dad's getting
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course there'll be a room for you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To be blunt , maybe I won't be able to get along with his new wife or her kids .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yours is a modern family . I'm sure your dad loves you and would want you to stay for the summer . You just need to try your best to get along with your new stepmother and her boys .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will be a new experience , and you might as well learn to adjust to changes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are right , I guess.The world keeps changing , and so do families . But I like a small-sized or medium-sized family where everybody is equal to everybody else . That's what I want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is good to have goals in life . If California doesn't work out , come and visit me in Korea , OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We could share a room ! It would be fun . And we could do some traveling around Korea . You could see for yourself what life in a big family is like !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like an excellent offer . I might take you up on that . Thank you for the wonderful invitation .
segments.speaker: S1
